snippet: Crushed fedoras will be sent to the two winners of City Room's Pulp Fiction contest, for which 500 readers submitted hypothetical openings for the actual 1950s noir novel "Atlantic Avenue."
abstract: Crushed fedoras will be sent to the two winners of City Room's Pulp Fiction contest, for which 500 readers submitted hypothetical openings for the actual 1950s noir novel "Atlantic Avenue."

headline.main: Judging From a Cover, and Writing Like Dashiell Hammett
